description:
Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Wildfire Bomb drops an additional cluster of bombs around the target, each exploding for 1,072 Fire damage.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Fragments of the Elder Antlers:

When Wild Spirits hits fewer than 5 targets, there is a 100% chance to cause Wild Spirits damage a second time.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Bwonsamdi's Pact:

Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pouch of Razor Fragments:

Bonus Kill Shots from Flayed Shot cause 6 targets within 12 yds to bleed for 60% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 25%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Elemental Conduit:

Up to 5 friendly targets healed by Chain Harvest will have Riptide cast on them. Up to 5 enemy targets damaged by Chain Harvest will have Flame Shock cast on them. Flame Shock critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Chain Harvest by 1.0 sec.
Equip: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 3%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.
Equip: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 25%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: While Stealth is active and for 4 sec after breaking Stealth, your Critical Strike chance is increased by 100%.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pouch of Razor Fragments:

Bonus Kill Shots from Flayed Shot cause 6 targets within 12 yds to bleed for 60% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.
Equip: Tiger's Fury causes your next 2 finishing moves to restore 2 combo points.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Celestial Spirits:

Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 25%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: The remaining cooldown on Vendetta is reduced by 1 sec for every 30 Energy you expend.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Obedience:

Flagellation now also increases your Versatility by 0.5%. Each combo point spent while Flagellation is active decreases it's cooldown by 1 sec.
Equip: Between the Eyes has a 20% chance per Combo Point to increase the damage of your next Pistol Shot by 300%.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Heart of the Fae:

Shifting Power can be channeled while moving. Each enemy hit by Shifting Power grants you 1% Critical Strike and Haste, up to 10% for 15 sec.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.
